error.msg: The scope of the variable 'numSize' can be reduced.
error.verbose: The scope of the variable 'numSize' can be reduced. Warning: Be careful when fixing this message, especially when there are inner loops. Here is an example where cppcheck will write that the scope for 'i' can be reduced:\012void f(int x)\012{\012 int i = 0;\012 if (x) {\012 // it's safe to move 'int i = 0;' here\012 for (int n = 0; n < 10; ++n) {\012 // it is possible but not safe to move 'int i = 0;' here\012 do_something(&i);\012 }\012 }\012}\012When you see this message it is always safe to reduce the variable scope 1 level.

error.msg: Cppcheck cannot find all the include files (use --check-config for details)
error.verbose: Cppcheck cannot find all the include files. Cppcheck can check the code without the include files found. To see what files Cppcheck cannot find use --check-config.
